item.title: Creating Beautiful Presentations with Story
item.description: This is a “talk” page in Story, which is the permanent homepage for a talk you’ve given at a specific event. It’s designed to showcase your appearance by bringing together information about the event, along with your slides and extra information like a video of your talk. In this way you can build a portfolio of your speaking history.

item.title: Creating Beautiful Presentations with Story
